Package com.fauna.response

Class ErrorInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fauna.response.ErrorInfo
  • public class ErrorInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will encapsulate all the information Fauna returns about errors including constraint failures, and abort data, for now it just has the code and message.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ErrorInfo

        public ErrorInfo​(java.lang.String code,
                 java.lang.String message,
                 ConstraintFailure[] constraintFailures,
                 com.fasterxml.jackson.core.TreeNode abort)
        Initializes a new ErrorInfo.
        Parameters:
        code - The Fauna error code.
        message - A short, human-readable description of the error.
        constraintFailures - The constraint failures for the error, if any. Only present if the error code is `constraint_failure`.
        abort - A user-defined error message passed using an FQL `abort()` method call. Only present if the error code is `abort`.

                       throws java.io.IOException
        Builds a new ErrorInfo from a JsonParser.
        Parameters:
        parser - The JsonParser to read.
        Returns:
        A new ErrorInfo instance.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown on errors reading from the parser.
